LanguageData.DMS_Tab.label: The Dead Man's Switch
LanguageData.DMS_Tab.generalDescription:
In the name of improving human civilization, Nara Industries spread technologies to every planet they anchored, forcing native residents to complete the selection process of the Great Filter amidst the turbulent technological progress in a short period.
Some people say that the colonial fleets are several groups of industrial complexes controlled by AIs whom are capable of interstellar traveling between galaxies.
